input.sentences: today the gang and i decided to go on a groovy adventure !
we went to the coast and found some really neat places .
old man jenkins even took us out on his boat . jinkies it was neat !
he took us to a neat spot and we were really excited !
this spot was really neat | but gang we did n't solve any mysteries ! back in the van !
output.sentences: Man i dont even think i can begin to describe to you the amazing time we had, the first thing we did was hop in the  van wich we decked out for the trip
travled  400 miles to  a lake in the middle of nowhere and my goodness was it beautiful
there where some people hanging out but it wasnt  overall to busy
the water was like nothing i had ever seen crystal clear
and the view ahh man i just wish you were there
